category: Articles of Incorporation/Article 8-2 (Obligation to protect personal information)
contents: Article 8-2 (Obligation to protect personal information) The Corporation is responsible for protecting the personal information it holds, and to this end, it must take necessary measures, such as training on personal information protection for executives and employees. Revised on January 5, 2022, [This Article Newly Inserted on November 1, 2010]
